mapper.insert:
insert ignore into grade (id, exam_id, account, score, credit, grade_point, level_name, level_point, rank, course_name, course_number, course_order, course_property_code, course_property_name, exam_type_code, exam_type_name, study_hour, operate_time, operator, exam_time, unpassed_reason_code, unpassed_reason_explain, remark, replace_course_number, retake_course_mark, retakeCourse_mode_code, retake_course_mode_explain, standard_point, term_year, term_order) VALUES
( #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.examId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.account,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.credit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.gradePoint,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.levelPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.courseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.courseOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.coursePropertyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.coursePropertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.examTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.examTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.studyHour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.operateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.examTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unpassedReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unpassedReasonExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.replaceCourseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.retakeCourseMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.retakecourseModeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.retakeCourseModeExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.standardPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.termYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.termOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
